mapper.select: select * from teacher where concat(name,cellphone,id) like "%"#{key}"%" and t_state=1
select * from teacher where id=#{id} and t_state=1
mapper.update: update teacher set password=#{pwd} where id=#{id}
update teacher set t_state=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT teacher.id) from teacher,skill_map where (skill_map.name like "%"#{skill}"%" and teacher.id=skill_map.teacherid) or teacher.name like "%"#{skill}"%" order by teacher.id

select distinct teacher.id,teacher.name from teacher,skill_map where (skill_map.name like "%"#{skill}"%" and teacher.id=skill_map.teacherid) or teacher.name like "%"#{skill}"%" order by teacher.id limit #{page},#{pageSize}
